oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An iron catalyzed regioselective oxidation of terminal alkenes to aldehydes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHOWDHURY, AD
RAY, R
LAHIRI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ANTI-MARKOVNIKOV HYDRATION
EPOXIDATION-ISOMERIZATION
ORGANIC-SYNTHESIS
ATOM ECONOMY
ALKYNES
STYRENE
OLEFINS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fe(BF4)(2)center dot 6H(2)O with pyridine-2,6-dicarboxylic acid and PhIO can efficiently catalyze the regioselective oxidation of terminal alkene derivatives to aldehydes under mild and benign reaction conditions.
